description: A single 30-year uncoupled (atmosphere and land) simulation in which sea suface temperature (SST) and sea ice distributions are specified and vegetation may interact.  Well mixed greenhouse gases set to present day (2015) values, sea ice and other anthropogenic forcing agents are specified at pre-industrial values.
keywords: RFMIP, Tier 1, PD GHG, present day greenhouse gas, uncoupled, atmosphere-land
long_name: RFMIP greenhouse gases effective radiative forcing
rationale: Quantify present-day effective radiative forcing (ERF) by greenhouse gases.
